name: Run Monkey, Run
description:
Made as part of GB Jam 10. Code/Music/SFX by Heckadactyl. Art by Pranta. 

(Please Read!)
INSTRUCTIONS:

Controls: 

X: Attack / Engage  / Drop
Z: Pick up, and Drop Bananas.

This is a stealth game!!! (sorry, ran out of time to make that more clear, my bad!!)

 Use the bushes to stay hidden and not get caught by the guards. You can drop a banana within a certain radius and the guards will eat the banana. 

You can only drop a banana once.

You can drop it in one of the bushes (plants), and then while they're busy eating it, you can hit X a few times to attack them.
